name: Berserker of Voxland
description:
Hi Everyone! This is my game special for ScoreJam23 made within 3 days How To Play
  • Move, parry, kill, repeat : )
  • You not recieve any damage while facing danger.
  • But if you were atack from sides or back, you can't parry this and recive damage, so keep an eye on those behind you
  • Try to survive as long as you can
  • You score points for moving and destroying enemies
  • All enemies has different tactics and fetures
Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys >>  Move around
Enemies: - Regular goblin:

- Just a regular goblin. Weak, slow, actually not very intellegent... 

-Trickster

- More dangerous variant, elite of goblins. First 2 attacks jump over you, and striking on 3-d 

-Warg rider

- Cavalerry, moves exactly on 2 cells, jump over you.

Future features: - New enemy types with new mechanics - New zones -Hero customization - New content! You should try to play this at least once :) P.S. For working leaderboard, you need stable and strong internet connection  If you will find bug or deffect, please, describe it below or send me email with instructions on mail:  quadrateamm@gmail.com
